Machine Learning / Data Analytics


The projects are related to machine learning and data analytics for Exynos series in S.LSI division, Samsung Electronics. This page also includes data analytics for coding institution in Seoul, South Korea. The projects have been motivated to find better optimal solutions than human's idea based on data analytics, machine learning and deep learning.


Table of Contents

  • 1. Reinforcement Learning for Resource Management
  • 2. Simulation Log Analytics for Testcase Similarity
  • 3. Data Analytics for Coding Institutions



1. Reinforcement Learning for Resource Management


Description

This project has been motivated to improve emulation resource management with reinforcement learning and find the optimal solution. The heuristic based approach has improved resource utilization much, however, the emulation environment cases are too diverse to define algorithms and polcies depending on different situations. Double Deep Q Network (DDQN), which is one of the basic algorithm by Deep Mind, has been applied to solve this problem.

To acheive the application for DDQN, the simulation environmnet has been developed, and simulation data has been generated from the previous job data. From the experiment, it has been shown that algorithm based on reinforcement learning has been better performance than no policy.


Skills

Python
Oracle PL/SQL
Reinforcement Learning
DDQN
Keras
PyQT
Pandas
Numpy
Seaborn
